text: "Don't Stop Believin' " is a 1981 song by Journey and is the second single from their 7th studio album Escape. It is their signature song by the band and decades after its release, it has become one of the most downloaded tracks from the 20th century. It has been covered by the cast of Glee. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Journey (band) songs Category:Rock songs
title: Don't Stop Believin'
